group_1.textLeft: I'm worried about all the problems@caused by Endless Mirrors lately.

group_1.textRight: Yes, to think it travels through time and@space, causing paradoxes...
But it ain't nothin' to worry about, cause@it all ends up bein' a waking...meme, right?

group_1.textLeft: Not "meme" - dream! Like a waking dream!
Anything that occurs because of a mirror@connected to the past or a parallel universe...
...can be corrected if you break that mirror.@Doing so turns it into a waking dream.
It won't affect our reality,
but we can still vaguely remember it...
That's why it feels like a daydream!

group_1.textRight: ...Oh, okay.

group_1.textLeft: Ah... You don't get it...

group_1.textRight: Erm...I thought you explained it well...
But...
Aren't there still mirrors connected@to other spaces?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...we didn't destroy them all.
Theoretically, we just need to find the mirror@portals that correspond to each other.
But given how many there are,
it's hard to determine which ones go@with which...

group_1.textRight: It's hard, even if everyone in the Union was@working together to keep an eye on things...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that reminds me...!
There was a mirror connected to@Mitakihara City, right?
I need to get in touch with Madoka and@the others.

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* We certainly have a lot on our plate...
Hm?
...It's from work.
*Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: You seem happy.

group_1.textRight: It looks like I'll be teaming up with@one of my former colleagues.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, really?

group_1.textRight: Yes. When I first started modeling and@had no idea what I was doing,
she taught me how to direct my gaze@and pose for shots.
I think I should buy her something to@express my thanks.

group_1.textLeft: Some confectionaries, maybe?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that would be good.
Come to think of it, she was quite fond of a@Japanese-style confectionery shop in Mitakihara.

group_1.textLeft: Mitakihara...!
Will you go there to buy some?

group_1.textRight: I wish I could...
...but I doubt I can carve out enough time@in my schedule to do so.
I can purchase something from a similar@shop in Mizuna.

group_1.textLeft: Um...actually, I can go to Mitakihara for you.
That shop you mentioned is in Mitakihara,@right?
I'm not totally unfamiliar with the area,@so I can do it.

group_1.textRight: Truly? ...If that's the case, I'm sorry for the@inconvenience...[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100201:motion_100][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_014.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]but I'll leave this up to you.

group_1.textLeft: No problem!
